env.name: THESYS_API_KEY
env.description: Thesys API key used to authenticate calls to Thesys AI service

env.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY
env.description: Google API key for Custom Search or other Google services

env.name: GOOGLE_CX
env.description: Google Custom Search CX (Search Engine ID)

env.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
env.description: Gemini API key for Google-hosted Gemini models

notes: This manifest is based on the summary and currently detected files.

The repository at present contains only README.md. As source files are added under src/app/** and package.json, rerun scripts/generate_manifest.js to update this manifest with routes, scripts, and external API mappings.
